changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `document_body` ( `id` bigint NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `amount` decimal(15,4) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Сумма', `deleted` bit(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT b'0', `price` decimal(15,4) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Цена', `quantity` decimal(15,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Количество', `document_header_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'id шапки документа', `inventory_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'id инвентаря', `receipt_document_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'id шапки окумента прихода', `serial_document_body_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'id строки в документе прихода', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `IDX_document_body_document_header_id` (`document_header_id`) /*!80000 INVISIBLE */, KEY `IDX_document_body_inventory_id` (`inventory_id`), KEY `IDX_document_body_deleted` (`deleted`), KEY `IDX_document_body_receipt_document_id` (`receipt_document_id`), KEY `IDX_document_body_serial_document_body_id` (`serial_document_body_id`), CONSTRAINT `bod` FOREIGN KEY (`document_header_id`) REFERENCES `document_header` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `inv` FOREIGN KEY (`inventory_id`) REFERENCES `inventory` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `rec` FOREIGN KEY (`receipt_document_id`) REFERENCES `document_header` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `ser` FOREIGN KEY (`serial_document_body_id`) REFERENCES `document_body` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3 COMMENT='Табличная часть документа'
